data.title: Sytner Alpina
data.meta_description: Sytner has been the sole UK concessionaire for ALPINA since 1985. Find out more here or get in touch to arrange a test drive.
data.text: *Terms and conditions apply. 9.5% APR Representative. Offer available on limited stock, for orders placed on physical new ALPINA's from 14th November until 28th December 2023 for registration and delivery by 31st December 2023 only. Models subject to availability. Offer may be withdrawn at any time. No cash alternatives available. Sytner Limited are a credit broker and not a lender. (subject to availability, offer maybe withdrawn or amended at any time. Participating Retailers only). Finance is available subject to credit acceptance to UK residents aged 18 or over. Guarantees and indemnities may be required. Terms and conditions apply. Offer may be varied, withdrawn or extended at any time. Sytner Limited are fully authorised for consumer credit brokerage (details of this and our trading names can be checked via the FCA consumer credit register – https://register.fca.org.uk/s/). We act on the lenders behalf when making this introduction. We are not an independent financial advisor and therefore, no advice or recommendation will be made. We will receive a commission from the lenders we work with (either a fixed fee or a fixed percentage of the amount you borrow). The lenders we work with could pay commission at different rates. The amount of commission we receive from a lender does not have an effect on the amount that you pay to that lender under your credit agreement. The lender will always set this. If you are an individual, sole trader or small partnership and we are arranging a credit agreement or a consumer hire agreement for you which is regulated under the Consumer Credit Act 1974, you have a right to ask us to disclose the income that we will receive for arranging finance for you. ^£1,000 (MRRP) Sytner BMW and ALPINA accessories only available on limited stock for orders placed from 14th November until 28th December 2023 on physical new ALPINA's for registration and delivery by 31st December 2023 only. We hold the right to withdraw the offer at anytime. Restrictions may apply. No cash alternative.
